name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #018: Neotomas' Paradise (5E)
detailed_description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 3-4 Characters of Levels 3-4


Recently, the homeless of the city have begun to disappear. Few seem to care, and many are actually happy to see them gone. The local magistrate is not however, and wants these disappearances looked into. Rumors have circulated that under the cover of night someone, or something, has been seen descending into the sewers below the market district via a grate in the street. The magistrate has tasked the PCs with investigating the sewers to see if any clues can be found relating to the recent disappearances.

5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.

Requires: An active license or a one time purchase of a Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Процессор: 1.6 GHz processor or higher
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Звуковая карта: N/A
  • Дополнительно: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Процессор: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Звуковая карта: N/A
  • Дополнительно: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
